snippet.title: Resident Evil Triple Pack - Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Take survival horror on the go with #RE4, #RE5, and #RE6 in the Resident Evil Triple Pack for Nintendo Switch, available at North American retailers beginning October 29th!

'Like' on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/residentevil

Follow on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/RE_games
